about_the_game:
This DLC contains sexually explicit content! Only suitable for adults 18 years of age or above, and contains content that some players may find offensive, including nudity, sex, workplace inappropriate, pornography, humiliation, werewolves, female dominance, violence, etc. Please consider before purchasing Add to!

After adding this DLC, the pictures in the album will be modified to adult CG. The subject matter, content, and form of this work are all virtual creations. Any similarities are purely coincidental. The fictional pornographic content in the content is for leisure and entertainment purposes only. Please do not imitate!
All characters in the game are over 18 years old. You must be over 18 years old to enter the game

Gameplay

Fairy Biography5: Demon is an interesting cannon shooting game. Players need to use mouse clicks to control gunpowder props, which can be fired continuously to clear all the treasure boxes in front of them!
After completing the level, you can unlock the 1v1 confrontation with the demon spirits~ This is a casual strategy game with elements of Western mythology! Unlike the past where it was just Eastern elements, there is a larger world view for you to explore.

Game background

This is a fantasy continent where werewolves, vampires, succubi and humans coexist.
One day, vampires and succubi joined forces and an endless war broke out... Humanity paid a heavy price here. As a human general, Alinda was exhausted and decided to sign a truce. But I never thought that this was the beginning of the conspiracy...

content_descriptors.notes:
This work may contain nudity, sex, violence, coercion, sexual abuse, humiliation, crime, lily and other pornographic content. Please consider before purchasing.
The characters, place names, events, plots, etc. appearing in this work are all fictitious, and all themes, contents, and forms are fictitious creations.
Any resemblance is purely coincidental and the fictional fantasy content contained in the content is for entertainment purposes only.
All characters in this game are 18 years or older.
